title: COAST ORB / laughingatscene
description: Convo with Logic about the scene of the party

dialogueTree.title: Logic: "This is it -- the scene of the part..."
dialogueTree.text: This is it -- the scene of the party. The fire pit, cigarettes, and empty bottles all evidence it.

links.title: You: "Hold up -- don't you mean scene of..."
links.text: Hold up -- don't you mean scene of the crime?

links.title: Logic: "Not as such. I'm talking about what..."
links.text: Not as such. I'm talking about what came after -- the party scene.

links.title: You: "Yeah. Sure does look like a lot of..."
links.text: Yeah. Sure does look like a lot of folks partied here.

links.title: Logic: "Looks like they were here a while,..."
links.text: Looks like they were here a while, judging from all the bottles. The sunken motor carriage provided them a focal point -- like a goose ice-sculpture or a chocolate fountain.

links.title: You: ""Hey, Kim. Looks like we've had a c..."
links.text: "Hey, Kim. Looks like we've had a couple of party-goers here."

links.title: You: ""Looks like they had a great time l..."
links.text: "Looks like they had a great time laughing here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hey -- let's keep moving, detectiv..."
links.text: "Hey -- let's keep moving, detective." The lieutenant adjusts his glasses.

links.title: Empathy: "Somehow he doesn't want to dwell on..."
links.text: Somehow he doesn't want to dwell on it...

links.title: You: ""This was some kind of theatre to t..."
links.text: "This was some kind of theatre to them. A circus production by a great clown."

links.title: You: ""Was this party against the law? On..."
links.text: "Was this party against the law? On the ice like this -- it was probably a public danger."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not as such, no. Let's keep moving..."
links.text: "Not as such, no. Let's keep moving, detective."

links.title: You: "Guess I'll be on my way. (Finish th..."
links.text: Guess I'll be on my way. (Finish thought.)
